Name: FIRST-CLASS SLEEPER “СВ” (DOUBLE-BED CABINS) — 18 SEATS
Title: The location of upper and lower seats in the car: all berths are lower.

Name: COMPARTMENT SLEEPER «К» (FOUR-BERTH COMPARTMENT) — 36 SEATS
Title: Each cabin is fitted out with two upper berths (even-numbered) and lower berths (odd-numbered)

Name: ECONOMY CLASS SLEEPER «ПЛ» (OPEN COUPES WITH TWO SIDE BERTHS) — 54 SEATS
Title: Each cabin is fitted out with two upper berths (even-numbered) and lower berths (odd-numbered)

Name: SITTING COACHES «С» — 62 SEATS
Title: Passenger train carriages operated by the Belarusian Railway accommodate from 30 up to 62 seats each. Coach interior arrangement may differ and depends on the model and indoor equipment.

Name: REGIONAL LINES BUSINESS CLASS MULTIPLE-UNIT CARS (SEATING ARRANGEMENT 2+2)
REGIONAL LINES BUSINESS CLASS MULTIPLE-UNIT CARS (SEATING ARRANGEMENT 3+2)
REGIONAL BUSINESS CLASS MULTIPLE-UNIT COACH DP1 (ДП1) — 91 SEATS
